description: SPOT-6 & -7 are twin commercial Earth observation satellites operated by Airbus Defence and Space (previously as Astrium Services), launched in 2012 and in 2014, respectively.  Each satellite has a life-expectancy of 10 years from launch and will continue to image land processes with improvements in end-user operation. The constellation preserves and extends upon the previous SPOT 1-5 missions.

links.title: Glacier Mass Balance Intercomparison Exercise (GlaMBIE) Dataset

title: SPOT-6 and SPOT-7 (Azersky)
